name: Poole 2014a code
tagline: Code for generating the scale dependant bias model presented in Poole et al 2014a
body: ### Code for Generating the Scale Dependant Bias Fitting Function in Poole et al (2014a) This git repository houses a Python script for generating the model described in the following paper: If this code contributes to any of your publications, please cite the paper mentioned above and refer to the following DOI that has been generated for the code:
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
